XPathFunctionException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a new XPathFunctionException with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized. If message is null, then a NullPointerException is thrown.

XPathFunctionException(java.lang.Throwab.Description: Constructs a new XPathFunctionException with the specified cause. If cause is null, then a NullPointerException is thrown.

ClassDesc: XPathFunctionException represents an error with an XPath function.
